name: Game & Watchâ„¢ Gallery
description: With this, the first of the Game & Watch Gallery series, you can enjoy four different games, both in their original and revised releases. Classic versions take you back to the '80s and a simpler time in video games. Modern versions feature your favorite characters and bring you to the present with improved play control and sound effects! In this release, you can enjoy these four titles: Manhole Don't let pedestrians fall! Fire Rescue the jumpers! Octopus Retreive the sunken treasure! Oil Panic Catch the dripping oil!
